item.description:
Shannon Paylor is a data scientist passionate about using data across a variety of subjects to answer questions more efficiently. She is currently pursuing her Master’s in Data Science at UVA, where she is working on a capstone project with the National Radio Astronomy Observatory using machine learning to search their image archive for dust in protostellar outflows.

Shannon has a background in statistics and has previously worked for a digital marketing agency, a news organization, a college baseball team, and the Yosemite National Park Archives. She enjoys working with Python and R, among other tools. She once dressed as pandas for Halloween.
